member.name: T:MonoCross.Touch.ViewNavigationContext
member.summary: View types used in marking views with navigational attributes

member.name: F:MonoCross.Touch.ViewNavigationContext.InContext
member.summary: decide in context whether to place the view in the master or detail pane following the view that this is the default behavior if a view isn't marked with a style

member.name: F:MonoCross.Touch.ViewNavigationContext.Master
member.summary: always place in the master pone in a large form factor layout

member.name: F:MonoCross.Touch.ViewNavigationContext.Detail
member.summary: always place in the detail pane in a large form factor layout, this is equivalent to Master for small form-factor platforms

member.name: T:MonoCross.Touch.IMXTouchViewGroupController
member.summary: View Group base functionality, dictates how the view group behaves

member.name: T:MonoCross.Touch.MXTouchViewGroupTabController
member.summary: MX touch view group tab controller.

member.name: T:MonoCross.Touch.SplashViewController
member.summary: Class to display the initial view when still warming up

member.name: T:MonoCross.Touch.MasterOrientation
member.summary: The orientation in which the master pane will render as part of the split view controller. If the master pane does not render within the split view, it will render as a popover.
